> [[ HP: 32 / 35 ]]

One potion left, though getting blown apart before you have an opportunity to use it is an entirely real possibility. Other members of the raid follow suit, bandaging wounds and drinking potions where necessary.

“We'll take him in the woods.” You suggest.

“I agree.” Nel nods. “I can move ahead and get his attention. Chances are, he'll take the gunfire as a challenge rather than a reason to flee.”

“He's faster and more maneuverable than us—but this affords the chance for those with slower attacks to prepare an ambush.” Kainzo says, leading the group over the fallen trees ahead. Nel is already off; he lights a fluorescent torch, then disappears into the dark brush ahead.

> [[ 1d100 ]]
